errorPin.description: The error message seen when an image can't be pinned
errorPin.message: Sorry, this site can't be sourced.

extDescription.description: The extension's description, seen in gallery and extensions page
extDescription.message: Convert any website into a source citation, with virtually no effort.

extName.description: The extension's title, seen in gallery and extensions page

menuAction.description: Appears in the right of RecordSeek menu item

optionSessionText.description: Text next to the checkbox that turns off hoverbuttons
optionSessionText.message: Do not store RecordSeek user session (Public computers)

uninstallLink.description: The link (currently a help article) opened by clicking on the pop-up welcome message

welcomeBody.description: Body of the pop-up welcome message
welcomeBody.message: With RecordSeek installed, you can click on any website to turn it into a source citation. If you need some extra help, click here to learn how easy it is to use.

welcomeLink.description: The link (currently a help article) opened by clicking on the pop-up welcome message

welcomeTitle.description: Title of the pop-up welcome message
